description:
Sara begins helping Sosuke with his detective work, and Livia is still making the best of life on the street while looking for her princess. It`s just a shame that her best, well, isn`t very good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Homeless Lady Knight / Homeless Lady Knight After / First Job
Homeless Onna Kishi / Homeless Onna Kishi After / Hajimete no Oshigoto
ホームレス女騎士 / ホームレス女騎士アフター / はじめてのおしごと
